title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync error
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
OB: The out of sync message occurs when the exported jar file is overwritten in the same directory (project) it was exported from.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to prevent the out of sync error.
SR: Modify the JarExporter to exclude the exported jar file from being included in the export process.
